title: Is efficiency of processors are increasing with coming technology? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes, it may not be as rapid as the times when we were following Moore’s law, but yes. the reduction in the processor lithography size has reduced, leading to less power draw, less heat, and the ability to place more cores in the chip. speeds and core counts have tremendously increased. there has been algorithmic changes too. technologies like hyperthreading,overclocking, iXMP, SpeedStep, etc have made them better too
